meanings.definition: The condition or state of being postmodern.
meanings.sent1: In the world of postmodernity, old ideas are often challenged.
meanings.sent2: Many artists today embrace postmodernity in their work.
meanings.sent3: The party was a mix of postmodernity and retro styles.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion sense was a reflection of the postmodernity of the era.
meanings.sent5: The professor's lecture on postmodernity was both enlightening and confusing.

meanings.definition: A cultural, intellectual, or artistic movement characterized by a questioning of traditional assumptions and values.
meanings.sent1: Postmodernity encourages us to think outside the box.
meanings.sent2: The film industry has been influenced by postmodernity in recent years.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show cleverly poked fun at postmodernity.
meanings.sent4: Her poetry captured the essence of postmodernity in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit was a celebration of postmodernity in art.
